A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Stephen Colbert is an old man with senile dementia. I'm not surprised he really believes that the fan backlash essentially comes from white overweight bald impotent women-haters. The truth is that this movie sucks donkey's ass big time. Disney is reaching new levels of lameness every day and their desperation is becoming evident.
Their last weapon of mass distraction (in order to avoid admitting Solo's failure) is the fake Kelly Marie Tran's drama on Twitter. You really think we are stupid\, don't you\, Disney? 

I read a lot of comments every day and a very few attacked the poor actress. The vast majority of the comments (say 99%) are about the futility\, superficiality and lameness of Rose Tico character. And EVERY SINGLE COMMENT points out that it is Rian Johnson's fault.
